name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $target
desc: Returns: The Reference(s) that were generated or updated by  the activity described in this resource. A provenance can point to more than one target if multiple resources were created/updated by the same activity.

name: $addtarget
desc: The Reference(s) that were generated or updated by  the activity described in this resource. A provenance can point to more than one target if multiple resources were created/updated by the same activity.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The Reference(s) that were generated or updated by  the activity described in this resource. A provenance can point to more than one target if multiple resources were created/updated by the same activity.

name: $period
desc: Returns: The period during which the activity occurred.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period during which the activity occurred.

name: $recorded
desc: Returns: The instant of time at which the activity was recorded.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The instant of time at which the activity was recorded.

name: $policy
desc: Returns: Policy or plan the activity was defined by. Typically, a single activity may have multiple applicable policy documents, such as patient consent, guarantor funding, etc.

name: $addpolicy
desc: Policy or plan the activity was defined by. Typically, a single activity may have multiple applicable policy documents, such as patient consent, guarantor funding, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Policy or plan the activity was defined by. Typically, a single activity may have multiple applicable policy documents, such as patient consent, guarantor funding, etc.

name: $location
desc: Returns: Where the activity occurred, if relevant.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Where the activity occurred, if relevant.

name: $reason
desc: Returns: The reason that the activity was taking place.

name: $addreason
desc: The reason that the activity was taking place.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The reason that the activity was taking place.

name: $activity
desc: Returns: An activity is something that occurs over a period of time and acts upon or with entities; it may include consuming, processing, transforming, modifying, relocating, using, or generating entities.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An activity is something that occurs over a period of time and acts upon or with entities; it may include consuming, processing, transforming, modifying, relocating, using, or generating entities.

name: $agent
desc: Returns: An actor taking a role in an activity  for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

name: $addagent
desc: An actor taking a role in an activity  for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An actor taking a role in an activity  for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

name: $entity
desc: Returns: An entity used in this activity.

name: $addentity
desc: An entity used in this activity.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An entity used in this activity.

name: $signature
desc: Returns: A digital signature on the target Reference(s). The signer should match a Provenance.agent. The purpose of the signature is indicated.

name: $addsignature
desc: A digital signature on the target Reference(s). The signer should match a Provenance.agent. The purpose of the signature is indicated.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A digital signature on the target Reference(s). The signer should match a Provenance.agent. The purpose of the signature is indicated.
